seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' with 4+ years experience requirement, matching senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, orchestration, storage infrastructure, and ETL/ELT operations

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on ETL/ELT, data orchestration, and batch processing pipelines, with streaming (Kafka/Kinesis) mentioned only as nice-to-have

leadership_expectation.evidence: Senior level role with responsibilities for team formation, practices development, and technical leadership without direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS explicitly mentioned multiple times with specific services (AWS Athena, CloudFormation) as primary cloud platform

secondary_clouds.evidence: Azure and GCP mentioned as alternative cloud platforms alongside AWS, indicating multi-cloud familiarity expected

processing_paradigm.evidence: Strong emphasis on ETL/ELT, scheduled pipelines, and batch processing workflows, with streaming technologies listed as nice-to-have

orchestrator_category.evidence: Multiple modern orchestrators mentioned (Dagster, Airflow, Prefect) indicating preference for contemporary orchestration tools

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions datalake technologies with AWS Athena for querying and Iceberg format, indicating modern lakehouse architecture approach

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid model requires being in Boston office for 2 core days (Tuesday/Wednesday), necessitating Boston metro area presence

timezone_focus.evidence: Boston location specified but no explicit timezone overlap requirements or team distribution mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid model requires already being in Boston area rather than relocating, no relocation packages mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, standard practice is to state sponsorship availability if offered

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support or F1/OPT eligibility, standard work authorization requirements implied

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, standard work authorization in US required without specific visa restrictions

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position with comprehensive benefits package (medical, retirement, equity) clearly indicates W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Multiple premium benefits including equity, annual bonus, comprehensive medical/retirement/lifestyle benefits, and unique perks like free security system

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'learning and growth are continuous' and collaborative environment, but no specific career progression paths detailed

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaborative environment and continuous learning mentioned, contributing to team formation suggests working with experienced members

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit promotion, advancement, or growth path language used in job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: Senior data engineer role implies individual contributor progression path, no management track mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have qualifications (strong knowledge required) and nice-to-have skills, balanced approach

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically on data engineering responsibilities, well-defined scope around data pipelines and infrastructure

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements appear reasonable for senior level - 4+ years experience with advanced technical skills, no unrealistic combinations
